thread.title: FuelCell Energy Appoints Tom Gelston as Vice President of Investor Relations

author: cnbc.com
title: FuelCell Energy Appoints Tom Gelston as Vice President of Investor Relations
text:
DANBURY, Conn., FuelCell Energy, Inc. (Nasdaq:FCEL), a global leader in delivering clean, innovative and affordable fuel cell solutions for the supply, recovery and storage of energy, today announced the appointment of Tom Gelston as Vice President – Investor Relations, effective immediately. Mr. Gelston is responsible for managing communications between the company’s leadership, its investors, and the broader financial community.
Mr. Gelston has over 20 years’ experience in various financial roles. Most recently, he was a Vice President of Investor Relations and Corporate Communications with Terex Corporation, a Fortune 500 diversified machinery manufacturer. Additionally during his 18 year Terex career he held responsibilities in business development, mergers and acquisitions, strategy and financial planning and analysis. Prior to working with Terex, he worked in private equity, as well as with GE Capital’s Commercial Finance division. Mr. Gelston holds a bachelor’s degree in finance from Fairfield University.
Chip Bottone, President & CEO said, “We are very pleased that Tom has joined FuelCell Energy and will be leading our investor relations function. Tom is an experienced IR professional who also brings a broad and deep financial background that will be an asset to our management team and shareholders.”
About FuelCell Energy
FuelCell Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:FCEL) delivers efficient, affordable and clean solutions for the supply, recovery and storage of energy. We design, manufacture, undertake project development of, install, operate and maintain megawatt-scale fuel cell systems, serving utilities and industrial and large municipal power users with solutions that include both utility-scale and on-site power generation, carbon capture, local hydrogen production for transportation and industry, and long duration energy storage. With SureSource™ installations on three continents and millions of megawatt hours of ultra-clean power produced, FuelCell Energy is a global leader in designing, manufacturing, installing, operating and maintaining environmentally responsible fuel cell power solutions.
